title: Text Only (BM25)
description: Uses the Best Match 25 full text search algorithm with default `k1` and `b` parameters. `k1` controls the scaling function between the term frequency of each matching terms and the final relevance score of a document-query pair (0 - 3). By default, a value of 1.2 is used. `b` controls how the length of a document affects the relevance score (0 - 1). By default, a value of 0.75 is used.

title: Vectors Only (ANN)
description: Uses the `text-embedding-ada-002` OpenAI model to vectorize the source text.

title: Algolia
description: This approach scrapes the NHS.UK site performing the required search query in this way exposing the top 10 Algolia search results for comparison purposes
